Who am I?

I am currently a second-year undergrad in the department of Electrical Engineering at the Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay. I am highly enthusiastic about coding, development, Artificial Intelligence and a lot more tech. I love tackling and solving problems, whether they be mathematical, logical, or analytical. I am always eager to learn and tackle problems especially related to tech or math. Always ready to engage in discussions on coding, tech and much more!!!
